00048 #ifdef __SPU__
00049 
00050 typedef int (*ctk_spe_task_call_t)(qword, qword, qword);
00051 
00052 #define CTK_SPE_TASK_CALLTABLE  ((ctk_spe_task_call_t*)CTK_SPE_TASK_CALL_ADDR)
00053 
00057 #define ctk_task_get_task_info() \
00058     ((ctk_spe_task_info_t*)(ctk_env.env[CTK_ENV_ID_TASKINFO].val32[0]))
00059 
00063 #define ctk_task_get_task_id() ctk_task_get_task_info()->id
00064 
00069 static inline int ctk_task_yield() __attribute__((always_inline));
00070 static inline int ctk_task_yield() {
00071     if (ctk_task_get_task_info() != 0 &&
00072         (ctk_task_get_task_info()->flag & CTK_SPE_TASK_SAVE) == 0) {
00073         // We cannot save this task!
00074         return -1;
00075     }
00076     return CTK_SPE_TASK_CALLTABLE[CTK_SPE_TASK_YIELD_NR]
00077             (si_from_uint((int)sbrk(0)), si_from_int(0), si_from_int(0));
00078 }
00079 
00086 static inline int ctk_task_exit(unsigned long long ret) __attribute__((always_inline));
00087 static inline int ctk_task_exit(unsigned long long ret) {
00088     return CTK_SPE_TASK_CALLTABLE[CTK_SPE_TASK_EXIT_NR](
00089             si_from_ullong(ret), si_from_int(0), si_from_int(0));
00090 }
00091 
00100 static inline int ctk_task_exec(ea_addr_t image, unsigned long long arg1, unsigned long long arg2) {
00101     return CTK_SPE_TASK_CALLTABLE[CTK_SPE_TASK_EXEC_NR](
00102             si_from_ullong(image), si_from_ullong(arg1), si_from_ullong(arg2));
00103 }
00104 
00113 static inline int ctk_task_spawn(ea_addr_t task, unsigned long long arg1, unsigned long long arg2) __attribute__((always_inline));
00114 static inline int ctk_task_spawn(ea_addr_t task, unsigned long long arg1, unsigned long long arg2) {
00115     return CTK_SPE_TASK_CALLTABLE[CTK_SPE_TASK_SPAWN_NR](
00116             si_from_ullong(task), si_from_ullong(arg1), si_from_ullong(arg2));
00117 }
00118 
00124 static inline int ctk_task_barrier_wait(ctk_barrier_ea_t barrier) __attribute__((always_inline));
00125 static inline int ctk_task_barrier_wait(ctk_barrier_ea_t barrier)
00126 {
00127     if (_ctk_barrier_trywait(barrier) != CTK_SUCCESS) {
00128         ctk_task_yield();
00129     }
00130     while (_ctk_barrier_waitonly(barrier) != CTK_SUCCESS) {
00131         ctk_task_yield();
00132     }
00133     return CTK_SUCCESS;
00134 }
00135 
00140 static inline int ctk_task_queue_enq(ctk_queue_ea_t queue, ctk_queue_item_t item) __attribute__((always_inline));
00141 static inline int ctk_task_queue_enq(ctk_queue_ea_t queue, ctk_queue_item_t item)
00142 {
00143     int ret;
00144     while ((ret = _ctk_queue_tryenq(queue, item)) == CTK_ERROR_RETRY) {
00145         ctk_task_yield();
00146     }
00147     return ret;
00148 }
00149 
00154 static inline int ctk_task_queue_deq(ctk_queue_ea_t queue, ctk_queue_item_t *item) __attribute__((always_inline));
00155 static inline int ctk_task_queue_deq(ctk_queue_ea_t queue, ctk_queue_item_t *item)
00156 {
00157     int ret;
00158     while ((ret = _ctk_queue_trydeq(queue, item)) == CTK_ERROR_RETRY) {
00159         ctk_task_yield();
00160     }
00161     return ret;
00162 }
00163 
00168 static inline int ctk_task_genericq_enq(ctk_genericq_ea_t queue, void *item) __attribute__((always_inline));
00169 static inline int ctk_task_genericq_enq(ctk_genericq_ea_t queue, void *item)
00170 {
00171     int ret;
00172     while ((ret = _ctk_genericq_tryenq(queue, item)) == CTK_ERROR_RETRY) {
00173         ctk_task_yield();
00174     }
00175     return ret;
00176 }
00177 
00182 static inline int ctk_task_genericq_deq(ctk_genericq_ea_t queue, void *item) __attribute__((always_inline));
00183 static inline int ctk_task_genericq_deq(ctk_genericq_ea_t queue, void *item)
00184 {
00185     int ret;
00186     while ((ret = _ctk_genericq_trydeq(queue, item)) == CTK_ERROR_RETRY) {
00187         ctk_task_yield();
00188     }
00189     return ret;
00190 }

00195 static inline int ctk_task_init_env(unsigned long long runtime_envp) __attribute__((always_inline));
00196 static inline int ctk_task_init_env(unsigned long long runtime_envp)
00197 {
00198     // arg1: runtime_env addr
00199     ctk_env_value_t *envp = (ctk_env_value_t*)(ls_addr_t)runtime_envp;
00200     ctk_env.env[CTK_ENV_ID_RANK].val32[0] = envp[CTK_ENV_ID_RANK].val32[0];
00201     ctk_env.env[CTK_ENV_ID_TASKINFO].val32[0]
00202         = envp[CTK_ENV_ID_TASKINFO].val32[0];
00203     ctk_timebase_clock = envp[CTK_ENV_ID_TIMEBASE].val32[0];
00204     return ctk_task_get_task_info()->id;
00205 }
00206 
00207 /* to return with 128-bits value */
00208 static inline int ctk_task_exit_128(qword ret) __attribute__((always_inline));
00209 static inline int ctk_task_exit_128(qword ret) {
00210     return CTK_SPE_TASK_CALLTABLE[CTK_SPE_TASK_EXIT_NR](
00211             ret, si_from_int(0), si_from_int(0));
00212 }
